text:
After my cat passed away, i couldn't enjoy the game anymore. However, this week i truly enjoy the game. I am glad that i decided to fantasia my retainer to be what i think my cat would be if she was born in FFXIV after she passed. Meeting her every day makes me so happy and help with coping.

On that note, i also decided to start decorating my house again so my kitty can live happily there.
